last_episode_to_air.name: New Year, New Boo
last_episode_to_air.overview: For their 12th and final date in New York City, our Leads must decide whether to continue their happily ever after – or end things forever.

name: 12 Dates of Christmas
overview: A holiday-inspired dating series set in a stunning winter wonderland. Follow a cast of singles as they step into a real-life romantic comedy full of cozy sweaters, fireside cuddles, and mistletoe kisses, all arranged to help these souls find love - just in time for the holidays.

episodes.name: Meet, Sleigh, Love
episodes.overview: Three hopeful singles descend on a picturesque Austrian castle on a quest to find someone to bring home for the holidays. After an inaugural Christmas feast that finds Kevin giving a lesson in French, the language of love, to hook Faith’s interest, Chad and Skyler test their chemistry on a snowy picnic. And during date two’s masquerade ball, the masks may not be the only things to come off.

episodes.name: Tis the Season to be Naughty
episodes.overview: The more the merrier! As Chad, Faith, and Garrett are introduced to new—and for some, not-so-new—eligible singles, their suitors seize the opportunity to connect…with each other. Later, the party winds down as our singles grapple with the difficult decision to send someone home for good.

episodes.name: All the Jingle Ladies, All the Jingle Ladies
episodes.overview: With gossip and booze flowing freely through a Christmas karaoke party, shocking secrets are revealed. While another elimination ceremony looms over the castle, the love interests do all that they can to catch the attention of our leads. As Skyler makes her case to stay, her intentions may not be as pure as they seem.

episodes.name: It’s Beginning To Look A Lot Like Kissmas
episodes.overview: ‘Tis the season to no longer be single, as Danny, Amanda, and Markelle check-in to a magical lodge and embark on a romantic journey to bring that special someone home for the holidays.

episodes.name: Jingle and Ready to Mingle
episodes.overview: While Danny and his lucky lady take advantage of their wine-tasting date to toast the new year, Amanda is smothered by affection, and Markelle fears he’s about to be friend-zoned.

episodes.name: ‘Tis the Season to be Jelly
episodes.overview: While jealousy begins to flow faster than champagne at the fire and ice party, the Leads and their romantic interests are temporarily united by “new” Tom.

episodes.name: T’was the Overnight Before Christmas
episodes.overview: While our Leads keep warm on their first overnight dates, those back at the lodge are left in the cold. Later, a shocking elimination ends with two surprising announcements.

episodes.name: Hot Girl Winter
episodes.overview: While a new Lead makes up for lost time, two of the love interests continue developing their own connection. Later, a surprise double elimination sets the lodge on edge.

episodes.name: Not So Silent Night
episodes.overview: Danny and Amanda struggle to give their dates undivided attention, while Pinij ends up in a “throuple” – again. Then, an ice breaker at the Winter Wonderland party does little to thaw the tension.

episodes.name: All I Want for Christmas is you… or Maybe You
episodes.overview: Danny, Amanda, and Pinij have one last day at the lodge – and final “throuple” date – before deciding who they’ll bring home for the holidays.

episodes.name: Ho Ho Home for the Holidays
episodes.overview: It’s out of the woods and into the real world as our Leads head home for the holidays with their new dates in tow. Then, an unexpected letter causes one of them to second-guess everything.

episodes.name: New Year, New Boo
episodes.overview: For their 12th and final date in New York City, our Leads must decide whether to continue their happily ever after – or end things forever.
